name: WOW
0:
”Alexa, turn on gourmet”
”Alexa, turn on TV room”
”Alexa, set entry to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill has integration with home automation projects with WOW systems. With this skill the user will be able to send commands to WOW modules to perform functions of a smart home.

The skill will only work correctly if the user has WOW home automation modules and a WOW system account.

With this skill the user will be able to say: Alexa, turn on balcony. The skill will process this intent and send commands to WOW modules.
